thread.title: White House jumper killed after attack in Pennsylvania court
thread.title_full: White House jumper killed after attack in Pennsylvania court - MarketWatch

author: Robert Schroeder
title: White House jumper killed after attack in Pennsylvania court
text: A man who jumped a wall at the White House in March was shot and killed Tuesday inside a Pennsylvania court house, according to reports. Curtis Smith of Coatesville, Pa., slashed a sheriff's deputy with a knife and was killed by another deputy after the attack. Smith was arrested March 1 after scaling an outer stone wall at the White House.
